title: Sample, 1967
medium:
Medium: wool (?), synthetic
Technique: 2/2 broken twill with paired wefts with plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 28 x 26 cm (11 x 10 1/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Broken twill weave with projecting tubular flaps. Flaps were formed by releasing tension on one beam while maintaining it on the other. Weft-paired pink yarn with unpaired orange chenille and unpaired purple for tubular flaps. Warps alternately wound on two different beams.
